Criminal news

Under Novosibir, a man killed a 50-year-old companion.

Novosibirc is charged under the heading " Intentional infliction of grave harm on a person ' s life, resulting in the death of the victim "

Novosibirtz was convicted for seven years of death for nearly three years ago.

In addition, a man was denied the right to drive for two and a half years.

In Novosibir province, a man took two phones from a friend and fled.

In this case, a criminal case has been brought under the heading of " Grabee " , the ibirak is under a non-resident subscription.

In Novosibirsk, foreigners received nine years of prison for attempting to sell methadone

It has been found that the defendants received coordinates on the location of a shipment of drugs from an unidentified person through a massenger.

In Novosibirsk, the company was fined for renting a casino.

The owner of the gambling club was aware of the gambling activities there.

Novosibirian will spend ten years in prison for arson of a friend.

Neighbour screaming for help, who helped to put burning clothes on the sybear.

Novosibirsk's resident killed an acquainted knife in the leg during a fight.

The court sentenced a woman to six years ' imprisonment, serving in a general regime correctional colony

In Novosibirsk, a man stole seven coffee cans from the store and got caught by a policeman.

A criminal case was brought against a man under the heading " Kraz " , the question of the selection of a preventive measure was being decided.

In Novosibirsk, they caught a stabbing germ on the office.

An illustrious man has been criminalized on several occasions by a 40-year-old citizen of the Krasnodar province.

Novosibirian will go to court for the death of almost all of the family in a hard road accident.

The tragic incident took place on the evening of 9 March 2023, on the 66 kilometres of the K-17r " Novosibirsk - Kokka-Pavlodar " track.

In Novosibirsk, police officers are looking for a suspect in the theft of a telephone.

Being in a shop located on Petukowa Street, an culprit kidnapped a smartphone.

The Novosibir inspectors had to shoot while chasing a drunk driver.

In respect of a man, the car was made up of minutes and the car was placed on a special station.

For a 20-year-old Berdska hacker, they're in charge of attacking the government of the Russian Federation.

A young person faces a restriction of liberty for up to four years and a fine of up to 200,000 roubles

The two Newsbirds will be tried for a violent beating of a companion to death.

The criminal case will be heard by the Novosibir Regional Court

Visitors to Novosibirsk received 7.5 years in prison for one gram of drugs.

It was found that in 2023, an unidentified person had offered the defendant for money to make mortgages on Novosibirsk territory, to which the figure had agreed.

The details of the killing of a woman and a five-year-old child in Novosibirsk became known.

The accused has now been arrested in absentia in the form of remand in custody, following the issuance of the necessary documents, and has been extradited to Russia.

Head of CCR requested a report on the murder of a woman and her daughter in Novosibirsk

Investigators initiated criminal proceedings under the heading " Murder " after a 39-year-old woman and her little daughter were unaccounted for.

A 37-year-old Newsiere stabbed an opponent during a fight.

The perpetrator had previously been criminalized for wilfully causing serious harm to health

Novosibirians were deceived on a popular website for moms when they bought domestic equipment.

There is an increasing number of Internet fraud victims in the region, with several referrals to the police from Newsybers who have found a viable option for buying domestic appliances on a popular mom website

In Novosibir province, the poacher illegally captured 48 fishermen

The man who was banned by the men ' s chain illegally produced the leather, boats, nalims and other types

Novosibirtz was arrested at the border for killing a woman and her five-year-old daughter.

The question of the detention of a criminal and his further extradition to the territory of the Russian Federation is now being addressed.

In Novosibirsk, a foreigner will be tried for a fatal ride.

The tragic incident occurred on 11 October 2023 near the Malinca Trade Centre

In the Republic of Altai, FSB personnel denounced a Russian-proscribed sect.

At the assembly sites, law enforcement officers searched and removed extremist literature - the community ' s followers do not recognize official medicine, forced solar treatment

In Novosibirsk, the ex-director of the Red Fakel theatre will be brought to trial.

Alexandre Kulabin, a cultural activist, paid a bonus to his son, former chief director of Timofei.

On the road under Novosibirsk, 13 kilograms of illegally extracted black cover were removed

The suspect now faces up to four years of imprisonment.

Novosibirtz was sent to prison for seven years for a drunken knife with a neighbor.

The incident, which had barely ended the tragedy, occurred in September 2023.

In Novosibirsk, a policeman was arrested for trying to override the murder of a girl.

So Maxim Babylov tried to marry his colleagues, he'll be there until 23 March 2024.

In Novosibirsk, teachers were accused of stealing 800,000 school laptops for a bet.

In the Kyrov District Court of Novosibirsk, the case of an informant teacher from school No. 64 is charged with numerous thefts of equipment from his own office.

Another News-Siberian policeman was detained in a murder case.

The CC investigator plans to apply to the court for the selection of a measure of restraint against a man

In Novosibirsk, the hijacker dragged the owner of the car on the road and entered the farmhouse.

The court considered that the accused was dangerous to society and detained him before 21 March 2024.

Novosibirtz is under 20 years of prison for selling a large drug ship.

The maximum penalty that threatens the accused for such a crime is 20 years ' imprisonment.

In Novosibir province, parents paid a fine for stealing their son.

A teenager committed two thefts from food stores, for which he was prosecuted

Novosibirtz will be tried for a call to attack the parade of victory with a grenade launcher.

The man was taken into custody, but the date on which the criminal case was pending

An old siber stole a jacket with money at the mall and ran away.

Law enforcement ensures confidentiality for all who have useful information

In Berdske, a foreigner was convicted of 80,000 roubles of bribes to a FSB officer.

A man was sentenced to three years ' imprisonment with sentence in a general regime correctional colony

In Novosibirsk, an alien was sentenced to seven years for attempted murder of a daughter.

The man was unable to reach the young relative because the police detained him and the girl was given timely medical care

RPK 2024 Novosibirsk
State Internet channel "Russia." Founder is a federal State unitary enterprise, the Russian State Television and Radio Broadcasting Company (GTRC). Editor-in-Chief of the GIC Rossia-Panina Elena Valerevna. STRK editor, Maxim Valerjevic Beborov. Tel. +7 (383) 314-60-00. E-mail: panorama@nsk.rfn.ru. All rights to materials published on the site are protected under Russian and international intellectual property legislation. Any use of text, photo, audio and video materials is possible only with the concurrence of the law holder (AGTRC). For children over 16 (16+).
